p: Remove test data from the application before deployment. This data may disclose information about the workings of the application and may assist attackers with compromising the system.
To remove test data from the application before deployment:
ol:
Identify data stores used by the application. Make a spreadsheet of all the places that are used by the application to store data.
 Examine data stores used by the application. Before deploying the application, examine each place where the application stores data and check for the presence of test data.
 Remove all test data from the application. Remove any test data that has been found before deploying the application.
li: Identify data stores used by the application. Make a spreadsheet of all the places that are used by the application to store data.
Examine data stores used by the application. Before deploying the application, examine each place where the application stores data and check for the presence of test data.
Remove all test data from the application. Remove any test data that has been found before deploying the application.
strong: Identify data stores used by the application.
Examine data stores used by the application.
Remove all test data from the application.

html:
What to Do

Remove test data before deployment.

Why

Remove test data from the application before deployment. This data may disclose information about the workings of the application and may assist attackers with compromising the system.

How

To remove test data from the application before deployment:

  1. Identify data stores used by the application. Make a spreadsheet of all the places that are used by the application to store data.
  2. Examine data stores used by the application. Before deploying the application, examine each place where the application stores data and check for the presence of test data.
  3. Remove all test data from the application. Remove any test data that has been found before deploying the application.
